Title: Who Runs this Fine Establishment?
Description:
While you were dealing with the tunnels and the workmasters, I saw a peculiar kobold go into a cave to the northwest. The Kobolds seemed to respect him more than the others, calling him Grand-Heister Bokk and offering him the food you call "cheese." This makes me think he is the real mastermind.

If that kobold is in fact the real Ward of this operation, then we should take the opportunity to strike him down.

I will meet you at this cave.
PortraitGiverText: Grand-Heister Bokk does nothing but sing, take the best candles, and eat lots of cheese.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Urtago in Fallside Outpost.
RewardText:
I am happy to see you, $n.

I feel my inner workings grinding--that's a sign of anxiety. Korgran nears his shutdown with every passing moment, and then this place will be under my care. 

It is a lot of responsibility. But I believe that I am ready for it.
